font.styleSheet: @font-face {      font-family: 'Uncut_Sans';       font-weight: 200;      src: url("/Webfonts/UncutSans-Light.woff") format('woff');      }     @font-face {      font-family: 'Uncut_Sans';       font-weight: 300;      src: url("/Webfonts/UncutSans-Book.woff") format('woff');      }     @font-face {      font-family: 'Uncut_Sans';       font-weight: 400;      src: url("/Webfonts/UncutSans-Regular.woff") format('woff');      }     @font-face {      font-family: 'Uncut_Sans';       font-weight: 500;      src: url("/Webfonts/UncutSans-Medium.woff") format('woff');      }     @font-face {      font-family: 'Uncut_Sans';       font-weight: 600;      src: url("/Webfonts/UncutSans-Semibold.woff") format('woff');      }     @font-face {      font-family: 'Uncut_Sans';       font-weight: 700;      src: url("/Webfonts/UncutSans-Bold.woff") format('woff');      }}     @font-face {      font-family: 'Nome_da_familia';       font-weight: 500;      src: url("/Webfonts/arquivo_da_sua_font.woff") format('woff');      }
